webscript.shortname: initialize a AE timestamp mark document.
webscript.description:
script to create a new timestamp mark document accept one mandatory parameters as url parameter : requestType - values : json or xml - tell to the service that the body of this post request contains the corresponding request format the body of the post must contains an area with this parameters : json : {"documentType" : "1", "documentDate" : "yyyyMMdd", "nodeRef" : "nodeRef"} xml :
1 yyyyMMddÃ¹ nodeRef
documentType is the code of the document type that this mark document refers to This service will return the markDocumentArea for subsequent document elaboration. The markDocumentArea it's an handle to be passed to next calls. supported return types : xml, json default : xml To use this service you have to call : 1. markDocumentInit - see corresponding action 2...n. markDocumentAdd - see corresponding action n+1. markDocumentPrepare - see corresponding action
